com.sap.conn.jco
Class About

java.lang.Object
  com.sap.conn.jco.About

public class About
extends java.lang.Object

The About class allows getting information about JCo. When running the class, a dialog will pop up showing all relevant information about the installation environment.

Since:
JCo 3.0.4

Method Summary

          Returns the string containing versions of components used by Java Connector layers.

          Checks whether the native layer is available and is already loaded.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Prints the version information of the Java Connector.
If a graphical UI (user interface) is available, the version information will be shown in an AWT Frame window, otherwise it will be written to the standard output stream.

Supported option arguments:

-stdout Print to the stdout stream instead of showing a window.
-noManifest Omit the MANIFEST.MF completely.
-noDigests Omit all Digest entries from the MANIFEST.MF.

Parameters:
args - the option arguments for printing the version information

getFullVersion

public static java.lang.String getFullVersion()
Returns the string containing versions of components used by Java Connector layers.

Returns:
version string of the JCo components

isNativeLayerAvailable

public static boolean isNativeLayerAvailable()
Checks whether the native layer is available and is already loaded.

Returns:
true, if the native layer is available, false otherwise
